title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.8 - Waiver
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.8 - Waiver

State Regulations

These rules may be waived, subject to provisions by law, by
the Director of Employee Relations whenever he determines that strict adherence
to the rules would be detrimental to the sound and orderly administration of
the excess vacation exchange program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
566.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
